docs.snippet: The president of the International Olympic Committee, Thomas Bach, continues to defend a decision to allow Russian athletes to compete, saying, “Justice had to be blind.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The president of the International Olympic Committee, Thomas Bach, continues to defend a decision to allow Russian athletes to compete, saying, “Justice had to be blind.”
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of the Times column recounts how embattled International Olympic Committee president Thomas Bach has repeatedly fumbled in his response to World Anti-Doping Agency report on Russian state-sponsored doping program.

headline.main: I.O.C. Chief Thomas Bach Supports a Peculiar Form of Justice on Doping
headline.print_headline: I.O.C. President Supports  a Peculiar Form of Justice

docs.snippet: As we rage about Russia’s state-sponsored doping, we might want to recall those decades when doping was a slice of American pie....
docs.lead_paragraph: As we rage about Russia’s state-sponsored doping, we might want to recall those decades when doping was a slice of American pie.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of the Times column, in light of reports that Russian government sponsored doping program, recalls United States had pervasive doping problem that was enabled by US Olympic Committee for much of 1980s and 1990s.

headline.main: Lest We Forget, the U.S., Too, Spent Time in the Doping Wilderness
headline.print_headline: Lest We Forget, the U.S., Too, Had a Doping Trail

docs.snippet: The odds are good the U.S. will win the gold medal count once again in the Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: The odds are good the U.S. will win the gold medal count once again in the Olympics.

headline.main: Like the US to Win a Bunch of Gold? There's a Bet for That
headline.print_headline: Like the US to Win a Bunch of Gold? There's a Bet for That

docs.snippet: Brazil's athletes were not subject to doping tests for almost a month before the Rio Olympics, the country's sports ministry said while refuting allegations it was a political decision to ensure the Games were not plunged further into crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's athletes were not subject to doping tests for almost a month before the Rio Olympics, the country's sports ministry said while refuting allegations it was a political decision to ensure the Games were not plunged further into crisis.

headline.main: Brazil Athletes Not Dope-Tested Ahead of Rio-Report

docs.snippet: French and Italian leaders made rival pitches to host the 2024 Olympic Games on Friday, but carried the same message: choosing Europe to host the Games would reaffirm its liberal Western values in the face of deadly attacks by Islamist militants....
docs.lead_paragraph: French and Italian leaders made rival pitches to host the 2024 Olympic Games on Friday, but carried the same message: choosing Europe to host the Games would reaffirm its liberal Western values in the face of deadly attacks by Islamist militants.

headline.main: France & Italy-Defy Islamic State and Bring 2024 Games to Europe

docs.abstract: Lifeguards at Rio Olympics are present just in case world's best swimmers experience emergency, but it is very unlikely their services will be needed.

headline.main: Lifeguards at the Olympic Pool? ‘Yes, It’s Necessary’
headline.print_headline: Ready to Jump In If Needed (Not Likely)

docs.snippet: Holding the Olympics in Rome in 2024 would send a message of defiance to terrorists trying to cower people into a "life of fear" and rob them of their sporting and cultural identity, Italian Premier Matteo Renzi said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Holding the Olympics in Rome in 2024 would send a message of defiance to terrorists trying to cower people into a "life of fear" and rob them of their sporting and cultural identity, Italian Premier Matteo Renzi said Friday.

docs.snippet: Bruce drove in three runs with his first Mets homer, and Colon picked up his 10th win as the team completed a split of a four-game home-and-home series against the Yankees....

docs.abstract: New York Mets defeat New York Yankees, 4-1.
